Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: i guess all that is needed is to ensure that *lifecycle.MetadataProvider* answers invocations that have *_lifecycle* in them ?

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: Though I guess you also need to register the *_lifecycle* chaincode into discovery as if it was a regular chaincode
